title: How to ace my O level Islamiyat paper - Quora

response.answer_text: I appeared in my/June 2017 and got an A* in islamiyat.One thing I can urge you to do is practice from workbook.I recommend workbook of Khalid hameed sohrwardhy for both paper 1 and paper 2.What I did was to finish both the workbook and learn the technique of identifying the question type.This is guaranteed for you to score an A*.
